channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Time to Force Putin to the Negotiating Table
item.description: He is clearly trying to play President Trump by talking peace while waging war. He will find that a very dangerous game.

item.title: NYT Uses Every Propaganda Trick In The Book To Run Cover For Mamdani’s Radical Socialist Policies
item.description: The Times is attempting to move the goalposts of what’s considered legitimate in American politics.

item.title: Institutionalize the Mentally Ill Homeless
item.description: Forcing people into treatment would raise the ACLU’s hackles, but it’s the only compassionate solution for people who cannot care for themselves.

item.title: It’s Time To Eradicate Transgenderism From Public Life
item.description: We don’t have to tolerate a demonic ideology that destroys lives, tears families apart, and keeps producing mass shooters.

item.title: President Trump Is Right to Fight European Tech Overreach
item.description: The Old World model of state management must not be permitted to hold back the advance of the freedom-fueled dynamism of the New World.

item.title: Anyone Who Has Watched Transgenderism Ruin Friends’ Lives Knows How Evil It Is
item.description: I know transgenderism is fake because I know what the 'before' looks like.

item.title: The Founders Wanted A Christian Nation But Not A State-Enforced One
item.description: Demanding, as Douglas Wilson seems to do, that public officials proclaim their personal faith in Christ is neither wise, nor moral, nor American, nor ...

item.title: New York Democratic Rep. Jerry Nadler says he won't run for reelection
item.description: Democratic Rep. Jerry Nadler of New York says he will not run for reelection next year, according to an interview published Monday night by The New Yo...

item.title: When Trans Killers Prey On Children, We Need Prayer More Than Ever
item.description: Amid the carnage at the Church of the Annunciation, Catherine Spandel prayed. A faithless world could take her lesson to heart.

item.title: Trump Is Right to Take On the Federal-Worker Unions
item.description: Labor Day should honor laborers, not unions.

item.title: Putin shores up ties with India and China while U.S., EU plan way forward on Ukraine

item.title: Trump to award Medal of Freedom to Rudy Giuliani
item.description: President Trump plans to award former New York City Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani the Presidential Medal of Freedom, a prestigious distinction for civilia...

item.title: 1.2 million immigrants are gone from the U.S. labor force under Trump, preliminary data shows
item.description: It's tomato season and Lidia is harvesting on farms in California's Central Valley.

item.title: Maduro mobilizes armed forces as U.S. warships prowl waters off Venezuelan coast
item.description: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on Monday said he "would constitutionally declare a republic in arms" if the South American country were attacked ...

item.title: Taylor Lorenz Has the Goods (Really) on the Left’s Paid Online Influencers
item.description: There is an invisible world out there, a hidden hand, and it is driven by money.
